trans-unit.source: Represents the root of the .rules files and contains all the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleDefinitions.RuleSets" /> and <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" />s associated with a workflow.
trans-unit.target: Representa a raiz dos arquivos .rules e contém todos os <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleDefinitions.RuleSets" /> e <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" />s associados a um fluxo de trabalho.
Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleDefinitions" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleDefinitions" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of rule conditions in the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de condições de regra no fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionCollection" /> that contains all the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" />s in the workflow.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionCollection" /> que contém todos os <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" />s no fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Determines the difference between <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleDefinitions.Conditions" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleDefinitions.RuleSets" /> in the original definition and the changed definition.
trans-unit.target: Determina a diferença entre <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleDefinitions.Conditions" /> e o <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleDefinitions.RuleSets" /> na definição original e na definição alterada.

trans-unit.source: A list of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChangeAction" /> classes that differentiate the <paramref name="originalDefinition" /> from the <paramref name="changedDefinition" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista de classes <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChangeAction" /> que diferenciam o <paramref name="originalDefinition" /> do <paramref name="changedDefinition" />.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> that targets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleDefinitions" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Representa o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> que tem como destino a propriedade <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleDefinitions" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleDefinitions.RuleSets" /> in the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleDefinitions.RuleSets" /> no fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSetCollection" /> that contains all the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleDefinitions.RuleSets" /> in the workflow.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSetCollection" /> que contém todos os <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleDefinitions.RuleSets" /> no fluxo de trabalho.
